import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductServiceService } from '../product-service.service'; import { Product } from '../product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-product', templateUrl: './list-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-product.component.css'] }) export class ListProductComponent implements OnInit { products: Product[] = []; constructor(private productService: ProductServiceService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.productService.getAllProducts().subscribe(products => { this.products = products; console.log(this.products) }); } }
